title: The life of Monsieur Des Cartes containing the history of his philosophy and works : as also the most remarkable things that befell him during the whole course of his life / translated from the French by S.R.
author: Baillet, Adrien, 1649-1706.
notes: Translation of: Vie de Monsieur Des-Cartes.
